lead_paragraph: A former scouting director for the St. Louis Cardinals baseball team pleaded guilty on Friday to criminal charges over a breach of the computer network of the rival Houston Astros, prosecutors said.

headline.print_headline: Ex-St. Louis Cardinals Scouting Chief Admits Computer Breach
headline.main: Ex-St. Louis Cardinals Scouting Chief Admits Computer Breach

snippet: A former scouting director for the St. Louis Cardinals baseball team pleaded guilty on Friday to criminal charges over a breach of the computer network of the rival Houston Astros, prosecutors said....
